actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To authorize the issuance of United States War Bonds to aid in funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.
short_title: United States War Bonds Act of 2009

summary.text: United States War Bonds Act of 2009 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to issue United States War Bonds to aid in the funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan and other military operations abroad identified by the Secretary of Defense as being part of the international conflicts against terrorism.

titles.title: United States War Bonds Act of 2009
To authorize the issuance of United States War Bonds to aid in funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.
